Package csci4448.AnimalShelter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnimalRepo
    Interface for the animal repository that utilizes the mongo repository class
    UserRepo
    Interface for the user repository that utilizes the mongo repository class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdoptedState
    The state of an animal when it has been adopted
    Animal
    The animal class is a superclass that contains features that all animals have, such as names, descriptions, colors, and state of adoption
    AnimalFactory
    A failed implementation of a factory for animals, that is still used to create an instance of a type of animal
    AnimalService
    Sets up a database object for the menu to be able to add/view/update animals through the animal service
    AnimalShelterApplication
    This is the main application where the program is run
    AvailableState
    The state of an animal when it is available for adoption
    Dog
    A class for Dog objects that is a subclass of Animal
    Fish
    A class for Fish objects that is a subclass of Animal
    HoldState
    The state of an animal when it is on hold by a customer
    Menu
    The class implementing the menu functionality of the application
    Turtle
    The turtle class is a subclass of the animal class, turtles have different types
    UserService
    Service creating the user collection of the database and connecting it to the application
    Volunteer
    The class containing the methods for a volunteer which is a user in this system
